results.description: Australia batsman Marnus Labuschagne signs a new contract with Glamorgan after his starring role in the Ashes series against England.
results.shortTitle: Labuschagne signs new Glamorgan deal
results.title: Marnus Labuschagne: Glamorgan sign Australia batsman to two-year deal

results.description: Glamorgan veteran Michael Hogan is awarded a testimonial season by the county, but rules himself out of the new Hundred competition.
results.shortTitle: Glamorgan's Hogan awarded testimonial
results.title: Glamorgan Cricket: Michael Hogan awarded testimonial

results.description: Glamorgan's former South Africa fast bowler Marchant de Lange signs a new two-year contract at the club.
results.shortTitle: Glamorgan's De Lange signs new contract
results.title: Marchant de Lange: Glamorgan hand new deal to ex-South Africa paceman

results.description: Glamorgan coach Matthew Maynard praises his team's recovery after a poor start in the One-Day Cup and a record run chase.
results.shortTitle: Glamorgan recovery praised by Maynard
results.title: Glamorgan Cricket: Coach Matthew Maynard hails recovery in One-Day Cup

results.description: Newcomer Dan Douthwaite is named man of the match as Glamorgan pull off a record two-wicket win over Sussex in a run-feast at Hove.
results.shortTitle: Douthwaite stars in Glamorgan win over Sussex
results.title: One-Day Cup: Douthwaite stars in Glamorgan win over Sussex

results.description: Max Holden hits a new Middlesex best List A score of 166 to help his side beat Kent and earn a One-Day Cup home semi-final.
results.shortTitle: Holden hammers record score in Middx win
results.title: One-Day Cup: Max Holden hammers Middlesex record score in win over Kent

thumbnail.altText: Max Holden's new one-day record score for Middlesex beat the 163 made by Andrew Strauss against Surrey at The Oval in 2008

results.description: James Hildreth hits 95 as Somerset beat Surrey to finish third in South Group and book a One-Day Cup quarter-final.
results.shortTitle: Somerset beat Surrey to reach play-off
results.title: One-Day Cup: James Hildreth helps Somerset beat Surrey to book play-off at Worcester

thumbnail.altText: Jimmy Hildreth passed 50 for Somerset for the 33rd time in one-day cricket

results.description: Gloucestershire miss out on the One-Day Cup knockout stages despite winning at Essex in their final South Group game.
results.shortTitle: Glos bow out despite beating Essex
results.title: One-Day Cup: Gloucestershire bow out despite beating Essex

results.description: Worcestershire pull off a record run-chase at Derbyshire but must get through a home play-off to reach the One-Day Cup semi-finals.
results.shortTitle: Worcs beat Derbys to seal home play-off
results.title: One-Day Cup: Worcestershire beat Derbyshire to seal home play-off

thumbnail.altText: Riki Wessels in action for Worcestershire

results.description: Alex Hales makes 36 in his comeback for Notts, but it is Samit Patel's 136 not out which sees them to victory over Northants.
results.shortTitle: Notts beat Northants in Hales' return
results.title: One-Day Cup: Samit Patel ton gives Notts win in Alex Hales' return

results.description: Tom Taylor's unbeaten 98 helps Leicestershire to a 36-run win over Warwickshire in their final One-Day Cup group game.
results.shortTitle: Taylor helps Leics to victory over Bears
results.title: One-Day Cup: Leicestershire beat Warwickshire in final North Group game

results.description: Durham are denied the chance to progress in the One-Day Cup as their game against Yorkshire is abandoned because of rain.
results.shortTitle: Headingley rain ends Durham hopes
results.title: One-Day Cup: Durham hopes ended by rain at Headingley

results.description: Nick Gubbins and Sam Robson take Middlesex to a five-wicket win over Glamorgan and into second place in the South Group with one game left.
results.shortTitle: Gubbins leads Middlesex to win over Glam
results.title: One-Day Cup: Gubbins leads Middlesex to win over Glamorgan

results.description: Miles Hammond makes 95 and Jack Taylor hits 69 off 26 balls to help Gloucestershire beat South Group rivals Sussex.
results.shortTitle: Hammond's 95 helps Glos beat Sussex
results.title: One-Day Cup: Miles Hammond hits 95 to help Gloucestershire see off Sussex

thumbnail.altText: Miles Hammond hits 95 to help Gloucestershire to a resounding victory at The Saffrons

results.description: Daniel Bell-Drummond scores an unbeaten century as Kent beat Essex to end their hopes of reaching the One-Day Cup semi-finals.
results.shortTitle: Bell-Drummond ton helps Kent beat Essex
results.title: One-Day Cup: Daniel Bell-Drummond ton helps Kent beat Essex

results.description: Holders Hampshire earn a home One-Day Cup semi-final with a comfortable seven-wicket win over Somerset at Taunton.
results.shortTitle: Hampshire beat Somerset to reach semis
results.title: One-Day Cup: Hampshire beat Somerset to secure home semi-final

results.description: Warwickshire beat Lancashire in a rain-affected run-chase at Edgbaston thanks to Sam Hain's unbeaten 84.
results.shortTitle: Bears beat Lancs in Edgbaston thriller
results.title: One-Day Cup: Warwickshire beat Lancashire to dent Red Rose knockout hopes

results.description: Rob Keogh scores 102 as Northamptonshire claim a consolation One-Day Cup win against Leicestershire.
results.shortTitle: Keogh ton steers Northants to victory
results.title: One-Day Cup: Rob Keogh century steers Northants to win at Leicester

results.description: Worcestershire seamer Wayne Parnell takes 5-25 to help thrash Yorkshire and knock them out of the One-Day Cup.
results.shortTitle: Yorkshire out after thrashing by Worcs
results.title: One-Day Cup: Yorkshire knocked out after heavy defeat by Worcestershire

results.description: Alex Hales' planned return to Notts duty after his England omission is wrecked by rain as the One-Day Cup tie with Durham is abandoned.
results.shortTitle: Hales' Notts return thwarted by weather
results.title: Alex Hales return rained off as Notts-Durham One-Day Cup tie at Grantham is abandoned
